Abstrak:
The main theorem proved here is as follows: If A is a finite dimensional algebra over an algebraically closed field, CompAd is an affine subvariety of AN, and X part of CompAd is a point representing an almost projective complex X degree, there exists a canonical vector space embedding 
 
 
 

TX(CompAd)/TX(G . X) --> HomD(A-mod)(X degree ,X[1]degree)     
 
 

where G is the pertinent product of general linear groups acting on CompAd, TX(-) denotes tangent space at X.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing : Dr. Intan Detiena Muchtadi dan Prof. Alexander Zimmermann
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
